name: The Adventurers (ascension)
description:
Welcome to the wasteland. You will take a motorcycle on a journey of choices. 

You’ll meet all kinds of people and things in the wasteland. You need to balance your 4 attributes in their relationship. 

If one of the attributes drops to zero, the adventurer’s journey ends. But don’t worry, another adventurer is waiting in the wings.

Features：

  • Cool motorcycle trip.
  • More than 30 random events.
  • Purchasable player abilities.
  • Endless journey.
